Latest figures suggest Animal Farm has now sold over 11 million copies worldwide. This information comes from WordsRated, a research organization focused on books and literature statistics.

2. **First Edition Sales**: Animal Farm was finally published on August 17, 1945, sold more than 250,000 copies, and received tremendously flattering reviews.

The claim that Animal Farm has sold 11 million copies worldwide appears to be accurate based on the latest available statistics.
